title: Client Not Responding
body: Hello guys!Today i wanted to switch my client and go back to the old one but there is a problem with that!I'm pressing the thing that says "switch to legacy client"but it won't open!Can you guys help me out with that?Thank you

replies.body:
Can you try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) that can be found inside your installation directory? You should find it here:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

If you still aren't able to launch the *Legacy Client* afterwards, please let me know.
